Scrape SportsBook Review's Historical Betting Lines

Source: R/get_lines.R
get_lines.Rd

This function scrapes the sportsbookreview.com website to return betting lines

get_lines(
  sport = "NFL",
  bet_type = "spread",
  period = "full",
  start_date = "20191222"
)

Arguments

sport

Sport to scrape. Possible values are:

  • NFL, National Football League

  • NBA, National Basketball Association

  • NHL, National Hockey League

  • MLB, Major League Baseball

  • NCAAF, College Football

  • NCAAB, College Basketball
bet_type

Type of bets. Possible values are:

  • spread,

  • total,

  • moneyline,
period

Length of bet. Possible values are:

  • full, Full game

  • 1H, 1st Half

  • 2H, 2nd Half

  • 1Q, 1st Quarter

  • 2Q, 2nd Quarter

  • 3Q, 3rd Quarter

  • 4Q, 4th Quarter
start_date

Date of sporting events

Value

dataframe containing betting lines for the given day

Examples

get_lines(sport = "NFL", bet_type = "spread", period = "full", start_date = "20191222")

#> Error in loadNamespace(name): there is no package called ‘tidyr’
get_lines(sport = "NBA", bet_type = "total", period = "2Q", start_date = "20191221")

#> Error in loadNamespace(name): there is no package called ‘tidyr’
get_lines(sport = "NCAAF", bet_type = "moneyline", period = "1H", start_date = "20191019")

#> Error in loadNamespace(name): there is no package called ‘tidyr’
